title: Mr. Peanutbutter’s House
description: A young bachelor dog is forced to re-evaluate his priorities when he agrees to raise two human children.
quote: Halloween costumes are a gateway to casual racism.
altHero: Mr. Peanutbutter in a 90s shirt carves pumpkins with two girls at a table
alt1: girl shows off a carved pumpkin
alt2: her sister is mad about her pumpkin, which is vomiting seeds
alt3: the girls give Mr. Peanutbutter a giant bone
alt4: the girls look uneasy while drawing at the table
